actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to make certain grants in excess of the 50 percent limitation contained in such Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to allow the Secretary of the Interior to make certain grants for projects under the Act in excess of 50 percent of the cost of the project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to make certain grants in excess of the 50 percent limitation contained in such Act.
